mapper.insert: insert into pro_order(userid, o_code, o_name, o_phone, zipcode, address, d_address, tot_price, payment, p_code, d_price, writeday) values(#{userid},#{o_code},#{o_name},#{o_phone},#{zipcode},#{address},#{d_address},#{tot_price},#{payment},#{p_code},#{d_price},now())
mapper.select: select o_code from pro_order order by id desc limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from cart where userid=#{userid} and code=#{p_code}
